ygData.subject: Status of Banshee aura not Grim Aura my mistake
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all. Sorry about the mistake. I meant the lev 16 banshee aura spell not the low lev grim aura spell that is commonly found. So please don t flame me
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all.

Sorry about the mistake. I meant the lev 16 banshee aura spell not the low
lev grim aura spell that is commonly found.

So please don't flame me saying either grim aura is here or there, or that I
meant banshee aura.

Thanks

Eloric Necromancer Rank 5

Humble Knight - MoltenLava - Mithannial Marr

... Thanks Kenneth

Kenneth E. Murphy, OCP
Research Associate - Oracle Database Administrator
OSEDA (Office of Social & Economic Data Analysis)
University Outreach & Extension
University of Missouri - Columbia

> Hello all.
>
> Is it possible to research grim aura. IE has anyone done it
> successfully?
> Also can you buy it? I heard it was for sale in either grobb
> or oggok at the
> SK guild but a friend told me that the heard the spell was
> removed from the
> vendor.
>
> Is grim aura still a working spell and can I currently
> research or buy it?
> Anyone with recent experience please respond.
>
> I have one of the required components but am lacking the words of
> divination.
>
> I have successfully made feign death and restless bones so I
> know how the
> research works, just not sure if the grim aura spell is researching
> correctly or not and if it is still for sale or not.
>
> Eloric Necromancer of the 5th Rank
